aboutUs.title: Sparalige By Matylda Borutka
aboutUs.text: My name is Matylda Borutka, I founded my clinic 7 years ago. Sparalige is a place of tranquility and relaxation, as well as physical and mental regeneration. We focus on individual approach and a careful diagnosis of the patient's problem. Don't know where to start? Contact me, I will advise:
